description:
Loki, the Norse god of mischief, has been exiled to the human world for what was apparently a bad joke. Along with being exiled, he's forced to take the form of a child. He's told the only way he can get back to the world of the gods is if he can collect auras of evil that take over human hearts, and so to do this he runs a detective agency. Loki is soon joined by a human girl named Mayura who is a maniac for mysteries, and she soon helps out in her own way. However, soon other Norse gods begin to appear, and most have the intent to assassinate Loki for reasons unclear.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name.native: 大堂寺繭良 / 大堂寺まゆら

node.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm
__Agency:__ 81 Produce

[Website](http://www.miki-ha.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/miki_shin318) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/三木眞一郎) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shin-ichiro_Miki)

__Non-anime voice roles:__
- Blade - *Honkai: Star Rail* (2023, Video Game)
- Charizard - *Super Smash Bros. Series* (1999-2018, Video Games)
- Alucard - *Castlevania* (2017, TV Series)
- Jason Bourne - *The Bourne Identity; The Bourne Supremacy; Jason Bourne* (2004; 2007; 2016; Films) (JP Dub)
- Erik Lehnsherr / Magneto - *X-Men: First Class; X-Men: Days of Future Past; X-Men: Apocalypse; Dark Phoenix* (2011; 2014; 2016; 2019; Films) (JP Dub)
- Lee - *Arknights* (Video Game)
- Kamejim - *Ohsama Sentai King-Ohger* (2023, TV series)

__Zodiac__: Virgo 

[Official website](http://yaplog.jp/sakura0908/)

Writes yaoi under penname Wasabi, Katsuo. Along with her collaborator [Higashiyama Kazuko](https://anilist.co/staff/96941/KazukoHigashiyama) (penname Wasabi, Maguro), they form the doujinshi circle Mad Cookie Monster.   
In Tactics, contributed the character "Ichinomiya, Kantarou".
She likes to eat croquettes. She loves vampires (according to her endnote in Arcana 4, ch. 1).

Originating from [Studio Live](https://anilist.co/studio/6460/), where he studied under [Ashida Toyoo](https://anilist.co/staff/110953/).

He made his debut as in-betweener on [Manga Nihon Emaki](https://anilist.co/anime/9856/) and became a key animator on [Cyborg 009](https://anilist.co/anime/4690/) but it was his work as animation director on the [Minky Momo](https://anilist.co/anime/518/) series that brought him recognition and he was asked to draw illustrations of Momo. Subsequently he became the character designer for the later OVAs.

In 1986 he made his debut as director on [Kyoushoku Soukou Guyver](https://anilist.co/anime/2293/). Following some more work as animator he switched to directing in the beginning of the '90s. He is nowadays affiliated with [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岡真里子)

Originating from Studio Live. Notable works as a character designer include [Jigoku Shoujo](https://anilist.co/anime/228/), [Ghost Hound](https://anilist.co/anime/2596/) and [Nurarihyon no Mago](https://anilist.co/anime/7592/). Close friends with [Hiroshi Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/101189/), and often designs the characters for the shows which he directs.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岡真里子)

Originating from Studio Live. Notable works as a character designer include [Jigoku Shoujo](https://anilist.co/anime/228/), [Ghost Hound](https://anilist.co/anime/2596/) and [Nurarihyon no Mago](https://anilist.co/anime/7592/). Close friends with [Hiroshi Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/101189/), and often designs the characters for the shows which he directs.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.
__Hiromi Kikuta__ is a Japanese sound director, who works for the company Rakuonsha.

__Non-anime staff credits:__  
~!
TV Tokyo Staff member for "..hack//G.U. Vol.2//Reminisce" (VG)  
TV Tokyo Staff member for ".hack//G.U. Vol. 1//Rebirth" (VG)  
TV Tokyo Staff member for ".hack//G.U. Vol.3//Redemption" (VG)  !~

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/258364/)._

Affiliated with [Studio DEEN](https://anilist.co/studio/37/Studio-DEEN).
Naoki Nakamura is an animation planner and producer. Not to be confused with the background artist Naoki Nakamura (中村直樹) (same kanji)
Director/COO at I.G Port Inc. and President and founder of Mag Garden.
